title: Species Unleashed: Second Novel of The Watch
description: Jake, Julie, Simon and The Watch return in this action-packed, thought-provoking sequel to Species Unknown. An ancient threat with unique powers and cunning has returned to the forested Black Hills of South Dakota for a purpose that could have global repercussions unless it is stopped. Only The Watch stands in the way of its murderous rampage, but to resist this killer is to risk not only life and limb, but also one's sanity. Hop aboard for a non-stop thrill ride that starts on page one and doesn't let you off until the last word. But be warned. What you read may have even you reexamining what you think you know is true.
author: Dan Carlson
